description:
Lady's Slipper Trail on Goat Mountain, a game trail named after the beautiful and rare mountain orchid, is home to deer, elk and black bears, and groves of cedar and western larch. 

The Local people refer to this as Goat Mountain but the offical maps call it Arrow Mountain
directions: North from Creston on Hiway 3A to Lakeview Road, follow it to Foster Road take Foster road until it becomes a forestry road, always keep to the right at every fork. Follow forestry road for 6km to Parking area. It's rough but I managed in a Honda Civic.
title: Lady Slipper Trail
